BodyName: Committee on Rules, Privileges and Elections

Items.Title: Joseph Puma, a resident of Manhattan, candidate for re-designation by the Council and subsequent re-appointment by the Mayor to the New York City Civilian Complaint Review Board, pursuant to ยง 440 (b)(1) of the New York City Charter. Mr. Puma will be eligible to serve for the remainder of a three-year term that expires on July 4, 2021.

Items.ActionText: This Communication was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
